name: Toad Cat's Cemetery Watch
description:
Toad Cat's Cemetery Watch

Play as Toad Cat, dispatched by your magical owner to vanquish the undead hoards of a cursed cemetery. Gain upgrades every ten seconds to aide you in your mission

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • ARROWS/ IJKL - Shoot
  • ESC - Pause
Features
  • 13 Unique and infinitely scaling upgrades!
  • 4 unique enemies
  • 1 Toad Cat
Credits
  • Gameplay: sam
  • Art: Michelle
  • Sounds: Shapeforms
  • Fonts: Eeve Somepx
